channel.title: LEON BLOG
channel.description: 运维小站，分享些技术经验。

item.title: Kibana
item.description:
<ul>
<li>kibana无法新建索引模式，F12 &ldquo;403&rdquo;: 权限问题</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">PUT .kibana/_settings
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;index&#34;</span>: <span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;blocks&#34;</span>: <span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;read_only_allow_delete&#34;</span>: <span class="nb">false</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>kibana磁盘满之后无法写入索引</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">PUT _settings
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;index&#34;</span>: <span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;blocks&#34;</span>: <span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;read_only_allow_delete&#34;</span>: <span class="s2">&#34;false&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: Kafka
item.description:
<ul>
<li>查看topic</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-topics.sh --list --bootstrap-server 127.0.0.1:9092</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>查看某个topic信息</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-topics.sh --bootstrap-server 127.0.0.1:9092 --describe TOPICNAME</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>查看所有消费组</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-consumer-groups.sh --bootstrap-server 127.0.0.1:9092 --describe --group --all-groups</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>消费消息</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-consumer-groups.sh --zookeeper 127.0.0.1:2181 --topic TOPICNAME</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>查看topic内容</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh --bootstrap-server 127.0.0.1:9092 --from-beginning --topic TOPICNAME </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>创建topic</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-topics.sh --create --bootstrap-server 127.0.0.1:9092 --partitions <span class="m">1</span> --replication-factor <span class="m">1</span> --topic TOPICNAME </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>删除topic</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-topics.sh --delete --bootstrap-server 127.0.0.1:9092 --topic TOPICNAME</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-topics.sh --zookeeper 127.0.0.1:2181 --list
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-topics.sh --zookeeper 127.0.0.1:2181 --describe --topic TOPICNAME
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-consumer-groups.sh --bootstrap-server 127.0.0.1:9092 --list
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-consumer-groups.sh --bootstrap-server 127.0.0.1:9092 --describe --group GROUPNAME
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-consumer-groups.sh --zookeeper 127.0.0.1:2181 --delete --group GROUPNAME
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --from-beginning --topic TOPICNAME</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: Gitlab
item.description:
<h2 id="git-lfs-问题" class="heading-element"><span>git lfs 问题</span>
 <a href="#git-lfs-%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>客户端配置：<code>git config --system http.sslverify false</code></li>
<li>参考连接：https://blog.csdn.net/root_miss/article/details/81450687</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="gitlab邮箱配置" class="heading-element"><span>gitlab邮箱配置</span>
 <a href="#gitlab%e9%82%ae%e7%ae%b1%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_enable&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">true</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_address&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;smtp.exmail.qq.com&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_port&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="m">25</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_user_name&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;gitlab@xxx.cn&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_password&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;xxx&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_domain&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;smtp.exmail.qq.com&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_authentication&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;login&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_ssl&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">false</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;smtp_enable_starttls_auto&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">true</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab_rails<span class="o">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;gitlab_email_from&#39;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;gitlab@xxx.cn&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">user<span class="o">[</span><span class="s2">&#34;git_user_email&#34;</span><span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;gitlab@xxx.cn&#34;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="gitlab迁移" class="heading-element"><span>gitlab迁移</span>
 <a href="#gitlab%e8%bf%81%e7%a7%bb" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>gitlab备份</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab-rake gitlab:backup:create</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>gitlab 定制相关数据服务</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 停止相关数据连接服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab-ctl stop unicorn
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab-ctl stop sidekiq
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 从1393513186编号备份中恢复</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab-rake gitlab:backup:restore <span class="nv">BACKUP</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1393513186</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 启动Gitlab</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gitlab-ctl start</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="gitconfig-常用配置" class="heading-element"><span>gitconfig 常用配置</span>
 <a href="#gitconfig-%e5%b8%b8%e7%94%a8%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span><span class="lnt">34
</span><span class="lnt">35
</span><span class="lnt">36
</span><span class="lnt">37
</span><span class="lnt">38
</span><span class="lnt">39
</span><span class="lnt">40
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>alias<span class="o">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">ch</span> <span class="o">=</span> checkou
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">st</span> <span class="o">=</span> status
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">staust</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;gitst&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">cf</span> <span class="o">=</span> config
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">ck</span> <span class="o">=</span> checkout
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">ft</span> <span class="o">=</span> fetch
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">fh</span> <span class="o">=</span> fetch
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">br</span> <span class="o">=</span> branch
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">brv</span> <span class="o">=</span> branch --v
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">geturl</span> <span class="o">=</span> config --get remote.origin.url
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">bs</span> <span class="o">=</span> bisect
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">lg</span> <span class="o">=</span> log --graph --decorate --oneline --all
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">cfg</span> <span class="o">=</span> config --global
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">cfga</span> <span class="o">=</span> config --global alias.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">pull</span> <span class="o">=</span> pl
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">pl</span> <span class="o">=</span> pull --rebase
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">cm</span> <span class="o">=</span> commit -c HEAD
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">ps</span> <span class="o">=</span> push
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">lsr</span> <span class="o">=</span> ls-remote --heads
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">udc</span> <span class="o">=</span> reset HEAD~
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">ftg</span> <span class="o">=</span> fetch --tags
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">am</span> <span class="o">=</span> commit -amend
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">cmd</span> <span class="o">=</span> commit --amend
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">rsh</span> <span class="o">=</span> reset HEAD~
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">cmi</span> <span class="o">=</span> commit --interactive -c HEAD --reset-author
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> --interactive
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">rss</span> <span class="o">=</span> reset --soft
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">rmc</span> <span class="o">=</span> rm --cached
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">cp</span> <span class="o">=</span> cherry-pick
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">cpx</span> <span class="o">=</span> cherry-pick -x
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">bl</span> <span class="o">=</span> blame
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">gk</span> <span class="o">=</span> gitk
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">ltn</span> <span class="o">=</span> ls-tree -r HEAD~ --name-only
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">lt</span> <span class="o">=</span> ls-tree -r HEAD~ --name-only
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">ltng</span> <span class="o">=</span> ls-tree -r HEAD~ --name-only <span class="p">|</span>grep
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">lgd</span> <span class="o">=</span> log -p --full-diff
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">bcm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;branch -a --contains &#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">brc</span> <span class="o">=</span> branch -a --contains
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">tagc</span> <span class="o">=</span> tag --contains</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: Elasticsearch
item.description:
<h2 id="elasticsearch伸缩容" class="heading-element"><span>elasticsearch伸缩容</span>
 <a href="#elasticsearch%e4%bc%b8%e7%bc%a9%e5%ae%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h2 id="水平扩容" class="heading-element"><span>水平扩容</span>
 <a href="#%e6%b0%b4%e5%b9%b3%e6%89%a9%e5%ae%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>将现有集群中的一个节点镜像到一个新机器(主要是相关配置 插件都使用已有配置，避免再重新安装插件修改设置等)</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 id="更改-elasticsearchyml-配置" class="heading-element"><span>更改 elasticsearch.yml 配置</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9b%b4%e6%94%b9-elasticsearchyml-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># new add config</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">node.master: <span class="nb">false</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">node.data: <span class="nb">true</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># modify config</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">node.name: new_instance_name
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">network.host: real_intranet_address</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="清空数据目录" class="heading-element"><span>清空数据目录</span>
 <a href="#%e6%b8%85%e7%a9%ba%e6%95%b0%e6%8d%ae%e7%9b%ae%e5%bd%95" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ul>
<li>方案一：清空数据目录</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># default path.data /var/lib/elasticsearch</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># exec shell</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rm -rf /var/lib/elasticsearch/*<span class="p">;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>方案二：更改数据目录：<code>path.data</code></li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># new add config</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">path.data: new_stroage_system_path
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># shell exec</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">chown elasticsearch.elasticsearch /data/application/elasticsearch/</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="start-services" class="heading-element"><span>start services</span>
 <a href="#start-services" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">/etc/init.d/elasticsearch start</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>查看集群状态：http://ip:9200/_cat/health?v</li>
<li>查看分片迁移进度：http://ip:9200/#/overview?host=Pd_elasticsearch</li>
<li>查看恢复进度：http://ip:9200/_cat/recovery?v</li>
<li>待平衡完成后 修改索引对应的副本数</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">curl -XPUT <span class="s2">&#34;&lt;http://ip:9200/INDEXNAME/_settings&gt;&#34;</span> -d <span class="s1">&#39;{
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> &#34;index&#34; : {
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> &#34;number_of_replicas&#34; : 3
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> }
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">}&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>http://ip:9200/INDEXNAME/list/_search?pretty&amp;from=0&amp;size=1</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="缩容操作" class="heading-element"><span>缩容操作</span>
 <a href="#%e7%bc%a9%e5%ae%b9%e6%93%8d%e4%bd%9c" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>服务使用的es集群中应先剔除要下线的节点</li>
<li>恢复成之前的副本数量</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">curl -XPUT <span class="s2">&#34;&lt;http://ip:9200/INDEXNAME/_settings&gt;&#34;</span> -d <span class="s1">&#39;{
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> &#34;index&#34; : {
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> &#34;number_of_replicas&#34; : 2
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> }
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">}&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li>排除es集群要下线的节点</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">curl -XPUT <span class="s2">&#34;&lt;http://ip:9200/_cluster/settings&gt;&#34;</span> -d<span class="s1">&#39;{
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">	&#34;transient&#34;: {
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> &#34;cluster.routing.allocation.exclude._ip&#34;: &#34;要下线的ip&#34;
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> }
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1"> }&#39;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: Postgres
item.description:
<h2 id="导出" class="heading-element"><span>导出</span>
 <a href="#%e5%af%bc%e5%87%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pg_dump -h IPADRESS -U USERNAME -t TABLENAME --column-inserts DATABASENAME &gt; BACKUPNAME.sql</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="表owner批量授权" class="heading-element"><span>表owner批量授权</span>
 <a href="#%e8%a1%a8owner%e6%89%b9%e9%87%8f%e6%8e%88%e6%9d%83" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-postgresql" data-lang="postgresql"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">REASSIGN</span> <span class="n">OWNEDBY</span> <span class="n">old_role</span> <span class="p">[,</span><span class="mf">...</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="k">TO</span> <span class="n">new_role</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="主从配置" class="heading-element"><span>主从配置</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%bb%e4%bb%8e%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ol>
<li>主节点配置</li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装postgre</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 切换postgres</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">su - postgres
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 登录</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">psql
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 管理员用户配置密码</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ALTER USER postgres WITH PASSWORD <span class="s1">&#39;YourPassWord&#39;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 创建备份账号及权限</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CREATE ROLE replica login replication encrypted password <span class="s1">&#39;replica&#39;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 验证账号是否成功</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">SELECT usename from pg_user<span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 验证权限</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">SELECT rolname from pg_roles<span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编辑pg_hba.conf,设置replica用户白名单</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/pg_hba.conf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">host all all &lt;从节点的VPC IPv4网段&gt; md5 <span class="c1">#允许VPC网段中md5密码认证连接</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">host replication replica &lt;从节点的VPC IPv4网段&gt; md5 <span class="c1">#允许用户从replication数据库进行数据同步</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编辑postgresql.conf</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/postgresql.conf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 分别找到以下参数</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">listen_addresses</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;*&#39;</span> <span class="c1">#监听的IP地址</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">wal_level</span> <span class="o">=</span> hot_standby <span class="c1">#启用热备模式</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">synchronous_commit</span> <span class="o">=</span> on <span class="c1">#开启同步复制</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">max_wal_senders</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="m">32</span> <span class="c1">#同步最大的进程数量</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">wal_sender_timeout</span> <span class="o">=</span> 60s <span class="c1">#流复制主机发送数据的超时时间</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">max_connections</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="m">100</span> <span class="c1">#最大连接数，从库的max_connections必须要大于主库的</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 重启服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">systemctl restart postgresql-9.6.service</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ol start="2">
<li>从节点配置</li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 运行以下命令使用pg_basebackup基础备份工具指定备份目录。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pg_basebackup -D /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data -h &lt;主节点IP&gt; -p <span class="m">5432</span> -U replica -X stream -P
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 依次运行以下命令新建并修改recovery.conf配置文件。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cp /usr/pgsql-9.6/share/recovery.conf.sample /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/recovery.conf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/recovery.conf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 分别找到以下参数，并将参数修改为以下内容：</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">standby_mode</span> <span class="o">=</span> on <span class="c1">#声明此节点为从库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">primary_conninfo</span> <span class="o">=</span> ‘host<span class="o">=</span>&lt;主节点IP&gt; <span class="nv">port</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">5432</span> <span class="nv">user</span><span class="o">=</span>replica <span class="nv">password</span><span class="o">=</span>replica’ <span class="c1">#对应主库的连接信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">recovery_target_timeline</span> <span class="o">=</span> ‘latest’ <span class="c1">#流复制同步到最新的数据</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 运行以下命令打开postgresql.conf文件。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data/postgresql.conf
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">max_connections</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="m">1000</span> <span class="c1"># 最大连接数，从节点需设置比主节点大</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">hot_standby</span> <span class="o">=</span> on <span class="c1"># 开启热备</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">max_standby_streaming_delay</span> <span class="o">=</span> 30s <span class="c1"># 数据流备份的最大延迟时间</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">wal_receiver_status_interval</span> <span class="o">=</span> 1s <span class="c1"># 从节点向主节点报告自身状态的最长间隔时间</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">hot_standby_feedback</span> <span class="o">=</span> on <span class="c1"># 如果有错误的数据复制向主进行反馈</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 运行以下命令修改数据目录的属组和属主</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">chown -R postgres.postgres /var/lib/pgsql/9.6/data</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ol start="3">
<li>检测验证</li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 检测验证需要主从节点之间存在数据交互，例如，从节点备份目录时，进行检测能够得到预期的结果。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pg_basebackup -D /var/lib/pgsql/96/data -h &lt;主节点IP&gt; -p <span class="m">5432</span> -U replica -X stream -P
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 在主节点中运行以下命令查看sender进程。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ps aux <span class="p">|</span>grep sender
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 在从节点中运行以下命令查看receiver进程。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ps aux <span class="p">|</span>grep receiver
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 在主节点中进入PostgreSQL交互终端，输入以下SQL语句，在主库中查看从库状态。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">select</span> * from pg_stat_replication<span class="p">;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: Mysql
item.description:
<h2 id="常用命令" class="heading-element"><span>常用命令</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b8%b8%e7%94%a8%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h2 id="mysql导出" class="heading-element"><span>mysql导出</span>
 <a href="#mysql%e5%af%bc%e5%87%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>&ndash;skip-extended-insert 跳过多行写入 &ndash;skip-quote-names 跳过 ` 表名 &ndash;complete-insert 带字段的insert</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="结构导出" class="heading-element"><span>结构导出</span>
 <a href="#%e7%bb%93%e6%9e%84%e5%af%bc%e5%87%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">mysqldump -uroot -pxxx <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--default-character-set<span class="o">=</span>utf8 <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--set-gtid-purged<span class="o">=</span>off <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--compact <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--no-data <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--databases xxx <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--tables xxx &gt; xxx.sql</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="数据导出" class="heading-element"><span>数据导出</span>
 <a href="#%e6%95%b0%e6%8d%ae%e5%af%bc%e5%87%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">mysqldump -uroot -pxxx <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--default-character-set<span class="o">=</span>utf8 <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--set-gtid-purged<span class="o">=</span>off <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--compact <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--no-create-info <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--skip-quote-names <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--complete-insert <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--databases xxx <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--tables xxx &gt; xxx.sql</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="binlog日志查看" class="heading-element"><span>binlog日志查看</span>
 <a href="#binlog%e6%97%a5%e5%bf%97%e6%9f%a5%e7%9c%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-plain" data-lang="plain"><span class="line"><span class="cl">mysqlbinlog --base64-output=decode-rows -v -v mysql-bin.021530 &gt;021530.sql</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="慢进程查看" class="heading-element"><span>慢进程查看</span>
 <a href="#%e6%85%a2%e8%bf%9b%e7%a8%8b%e6%9f%a5%e7%9c%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-sql" data-lang="sql"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">select</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">id</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="k">user</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="k">host</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">db</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">command</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">time</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="k">state</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">info</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">from</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">information_schema</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">PROCESSLIST</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">order</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">by</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">time</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="k">desc</span><span class="p">;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="slave-链接-master-配置" class="heading-element"><span>Slave 链接 master 配置</span>
 <a href="#slave-%e9%93%be%e6%8e%a5-master-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">

</div><h2 id="information_schema" class="heading-element"><span>information_schema</span>
 <a href="#information_schema" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>表空间优化</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>碎片大小 = 数据总大小 - 实际表空间文件大小 数据总大小 = Data_length + Index_length = 101842944<br>
实际表空间文件大小 = rows_Avg_row_length = 101177624<br>
碎片大小 = (101842944 - 101177624) / 1024 /1024 = 0.63MB</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>整理碎片</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>alter table table_name engine = innodb<br>
pt-online-schema-change optimize table<br>
命令整理: show table status from DBNAME like &lsquo;%TABLENAME%&rsquo; \G 查看;</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>pt-online-schema-change-shell</li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#!/bin/bash
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span><span class="nb">source</span> /etc/profile
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pt-online-schema-change <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--defaults-file<span class="o">=</span>/etc/my.cnf <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>-uroot -h localhost --password<span class="o">=</span>PASSWORD <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>--alter<span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;ENGINE=InnoDB&#34;</span> <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span><span class="nv">D</span><span class="o">=</span>DBNAME,t<span class="o">=</span>TABLENAME <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>1--no-check-replication-filters --alter-foreign-keys-method<span class="o">=</span>auto <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span>1--recursion-method<span class="o">=</span>none --print <span class="se">\

item.title: Apisix
item.description:
<h2 id="nginx-proxy_pass---问题" class="heading-element"><span>Nginx proxy_pass + / 问题:</span>
 <a href="#nginx-proxy_pass---%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">location /api <span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	proxy_pass http://api_proxy/<span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 访问: http://api.xxx.com/api/admin;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 转发效果：http://api_proxy/admin;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><blockquote>
<p>由于Apisix 使用的是radixtree 的写法, 导致只支持匹配规则(Full match,Prefix matching) , 并且不会去掉匹配的路径, 这个时候,
为了去掉上面的 /api , 需要使用到插件：proxy-rewrite<br>
Apisix-Router：https://apisix.apache.org/zh/docs/apisix/terminology/router<br>
Proxy-rewrite：https://apisix.apache.org/zh/docs/apisix/plugins/proxy-rewrite<br>
ngx_http_rewirte_module：https://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_rewrite_module.html<br>
ngx_http_proxy_module：https://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_proxy_module.html<br>
ngx_stream_proxy_module：http://nginx.org/en/docs/stream/ngx_stream_proxy_module.html</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span><span class="lnt">29
</span><span class="lnt">30
</span><span class="lnt">31
</span><span class="lnt">32
</span><span class="lnt">33
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-json" data-lang="json"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;uri&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&#34;/api*&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;name&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&#34;api&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;id&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&#34;489259072256738721&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;upstream&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;type&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&#34;roundrobin&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;pass_host&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&#34;pass&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;nodes&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;10.1.1.1:3030&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">10</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;timeout&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;send&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;connect&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;read&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">6</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;scheme&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&#34;http&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;keepalive_pool&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;idle_timeout&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">60</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;requests&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;size&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">320</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;plugins&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;proxy-rewrite&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;regex_uri&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;^/api(.*)$&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s2">&#34;$1&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">},</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;status&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nt">&#34;host&#34;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&#34;api.xxx.com&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: Lrzsz
item.description:
<h2 id="安装lrsz" class="heading-element"><span>安装lrsz</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85lrsz" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">brew install lrzsz</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="iterm2-send-zmodemsh" class="heading-element"><span>iterm2-send-zmodem.sh</span>
 <a href="#iterm2-send-zmodemsh" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#!/bin/bash
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>osascript -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm2&#34; to version&#39;</span> &gt; /dev/null 2&gt;<span class="p">&amp;</span><span class="m">1</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="nv">NAME</span><span class="o">=</span>iTerm2 <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nv">NAME</span><span class="o">=</span>iTerm
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">if</span> <span class="o">[[</span> <span class="nv">$NAME</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;iTerm&#34;</span> <span class="o">]]</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="k">then</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">FILE</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">$(</span>osascript -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm&#34; to activate&#39;</span> -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm&#34; to set thefile to choose file with prompt &#34;Choose a file to send&#34;&#39;</span> -e <span class="s2">&#34;do shell script (\&#34;echo \&#34;&amp;(quoted form of POSIX path of thefile as Unicode text)&amp;\&#34;\&#34;)&#34;</span><span class="k">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">FILE</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">$(</span>osascript -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm2&#34; to activate&#39;</span> -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm2&#34; to set thefile to choose file with prompt &#34;Choose a file to send&#34;&#39;</span> -e <span class="s2">&#34;do shell script (\&#34;echo \&#34;&amp;(quoted form of POSIX path of thefile as Unicode text)&amp;\&#34;\&#34;)&#34;</span><span class="k">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">fi</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">if</span> <span class="o">[[</span> <span class="nv">$FILE</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span> <span class="o">]]</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="k">then</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span> Cancelled.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="c1"># Send ZModem cancel</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span> -e <span class="se">\\</span>x18<span class="se">\\</span>x18<span class="se">\\</span>x18<span class="se">\\</span>x18<span class="se">\\</span>x18
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	sleep <span class="m">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span> <span class="se">\#</span> Cancelled transfer
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	/usr/local/bin/sz <span class="s2">&#34;</span><span class="nv">$FILE</span><span class="s2">&#34;</span> --escape --binary --bufsize <span class="m">4096</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	sleep <span class="m">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span> <span class="se">\#</span> Received <span class="s2">&#34;</span><span class="nv">$FILE</span><span class="s2">&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">fi</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="iterm2-recv-zmodemsh" class="heading-element"><span>iterm2-recv-zmodem.sh</span>
 <a href="#iterm2-recv-zmodemsh" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#!/bin/bash
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>osascript -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm2&#34; to version&#39;</span> &gt; /dev/null 2&gt;<span class="p">&amp;</span><span class="m">1</span> <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> <span class="nv">NAME</span><span class="o">=</span>iTerm2 <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nv">NAME</span><span class="o">=</span>iTerm
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">if</span> <span class="o">[[</span> <span class="nv">$NAME</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;iTerm&#34;</span> <span class="o">]]</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="k">then</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">FILE</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">$(</span>osascript -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm&#34; to activate&#39;</span> -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm&#34; to set thefile to choose folder with prompt &#34;Choose a folder to place received files in&#34;&#39;</span> -e <span class="s2">&#34;do shell script (\&#34;echo \&#34;&amp;(quoted form of POSIX path of thefile as Unicode text)&amp;\&#34;\&#34;)&#34;</span><span class="k">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nv">FILE</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">$(</span>osascript -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm2&#34; to activate&#39;</span> -e <span class="s1">&#39;tell application &#34;iTerm2&#34; to set thefile to choose folder with prompt &#34;Choose a folder to place received files in&#34;&#39;</span> -e <span class="s2">&#34;do shell script (\&#34;echo \&#34;&amp;(quoted form of POSIX path of thefile as Unicode text)&amp;\&#34;\&#34;)&#34;</span><span class="k">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">fi</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">if</span> <span class="o">[[</span> <span class="nv">$FILE</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span> <span class="o">]]</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="k">then</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span> Cancelled.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="c1"># Send ZModem cancel</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span> -e <span class="se">\\</span>x18<span class="se">\\</span>x18<span class="se">\\</span>x18<span class="se">\\</span>x18<span class="se">\\</span>x18
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	sleep <span class="m">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span> <span class="se">\#</span> Cancelled transfer
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">cd</span> <span class="s2">&#34;</span><span class="nv">$FILE</span><span class="s2">&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	/usr/local/bin/rz --rename --escape --binary --bufsize <span class="m">4096</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	sleep <span class="m">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">	<span class="nb">echo</span> <span class="se">\#</span> Sent <span class="se">\-\&gt;</span> <span class="nv">$FILE</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">fi</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="iterm2-triggers配置" class="heading-element"><span>iterm2 triggers配置</span>
 <a href="#iterm2-triggers%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">

 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">Regular expression: rz waiting to receive.<span class="se">\*\*</span>B0100
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Action: Run Silent Coprocess
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Parameters: /usr/local/bin/iterm2-send-zmodem.sh

item.title: Tomcat
item.description:
<h2 id="版本号隐藏" class="heading-element"><span>版本号隐藏</span>
 <a href="#%e7%89%88%e6%9c%ac%e5%8f%b7%e9%9a%90%e8%97%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ol>
<li>进入到tomcat 目录</li>
<li>mv webapps/ROOT webapps/ROOT</li>
<li>mkdir webapps/ROOT$(date +%Y%m%d)</li>
<li>编辑conf/server.xml配置文件中的配置项中添加如下配置：</li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-xml" data-lang="xml"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nt">&lt;Valve</span> <span class="na">className=</span><span class="s">&#34;org.apache.catalina.valves.ErrorReportValve&#34;</span> <span class="na">showReport=</span><span class="s">&#34;false&#34;</span> <span class="na">showServerInfo=</span><span class="s">&#34;false&#34;</span> <span class="nt">/&gt;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ol start="5">
<li>修改后再次访问，返回404</li>
</ol>

item.title: Java
item.description:
<h2 id="java-home-配置" class="heading-element"><span>java home 配置</span>
 <a href="#java-home-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">vim /etc/profile
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">JAVA_HOME</span><span class="o">=</span>/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.312.b07-10.p01.ky10.aarch64/jre/
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">PATH</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nv">$JAVA_HOME</span>/bin:<span class="nv">$PATH</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">CLASSPATH</span><span class="o">=</span>.:<span class="nv">$JAVA_HOME</span>/lib/dt.jar:<span class="nv">$JAVA_HOME</span>/lib/tools.jar</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>
